sourcesContent:
import useFecth from "./usefectch"; import Carousel from "react-elastic-carousel"; const Review = ({id}) => { const {data:reviews, isPending, error, setUrl}=useFecth('https://api.themoviedb.org/3/movie/'+id+'/reviews?api_key=05b670c12d1973fe82919a005ef06481'); const base_url= 'https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500'; return (
{reviews && reviews.map((review)=>

{review.author}

{review.author_details.rating}
{review.content}
{review.updated_at}
)}
 ); } export default Review;
